elements.name: B9_context
elements.title: Task B9
elements.html:
Summarise

Original: Unfortunately, Mr. Stanley has shown time and time again that he has issues performing. For example, last week he had a deadline that he knew of, instead he took long lunches and never made the deadline. Also, his ability to show up on time and dressed accordingly has never happened. Everyday Wade has been a minimum of 15+ minutes late! This is very unacceptable, he is a nice person and I wish him the best, but potential for growth is not there.

Golden Fish
Mr. Stanley consistently underperforms, misses deadlines, and has issues with punctuality. He shows no potential for growth within the company.


Blue Whale
Wade: Repeated performance issues (missed deadline, chronic lateness >15mins, dress). Nice person, but no growth potential.


Green Elephant
Stanley consistently underperforms, misses deadlines (e.g., last week's), and is habitually late (+15 min daily) and unprofessionally dressed. Lacks growth potential.


Red Panda
Mr. Stanley consistently underperforms: missed deadlines, habitual tardiness (15+ mins daily), and inappropriate dress. Despite being personable, he shows no potential for growth. Performance issues are ongoing and unacceptable.

elements.name: B11_context
elements.title: Task B11
elements.html:
Summarise

Original: Aniya is very good at what she does, and a favourite of the whole team. At the end of the quarter, she is one of the members we rely on the most due to her high output. She is a consistent worker. Unlikely to be moved into managerial roles as she has struggled with leadership.

Blue Whale
Aniya is a consistent, high-output performer and a reliable team member. However, she struggles with leadership, limiting her managerial potential.


Golden Fish
Aniya: Very good, team favorite, high output, consistent. Relied on most. Struggles with leadership, unlikely for management.


Red Panda
Aniya is a highly valued, consistent, and productive team member. While a strong individual contributor, she's not suited for leadership roles.


Green Elephant
Aniya is a top performer and team favorite, known for her consistent high output and reliability. She excels in her role but is unlikely to move into management due to leadership challenges.

elements.title: Please select the correct statement
elements.description: ORIGINAL: The sun appears to rise each morning from the eastern horizon before setting in the west

choices.text: The moon rises in the east.
The sun rises in the west.
The sun rises in the east.

elements.name: B5_context
elements.title: Task B5
elements.html:
From idea to full feedback

Original: Alex Watts is a reliable, steady contributor; cross-training would broaden skills and impact.

Golden Fish
Alex, you are a valued and reliable contributor. To expand your impact and professional growth, we highly recommend cross-training. This will broaden your skillset and increase your versatility within the team.


Green Elephant
Alex, you are a valued, reliable, and steady performer. To broaden your impact and skillset, we recommend exploring cross-training opportunities. Developing additional capabilities will not only increase your versatility but also enhance your contributions to the team's overall success.


Blue Whale
Alex consistently delivers high-quality work, demonstrating strong reliability and a steady contribution to the team's success. To further enhance their valuable impact, we recommend exploring cross-training opportunities. This would broaden Alex's skill set, increase versatility, and allow them to contribute to an even wider range of projects, fostering continued professional growth.


Red Panda
Alex Watts is a reliable and consistent contributor who delivers high-quality work. Expanding expertise through cross-training would further enhance skills, increase versatility, and amplify overall impact across teams.

elements.name: B6_context
elements.title: Task B6
elements.html:
From idea to full feedback

Original: Emilie Carroll is a high performer—punctual, client-focused, and poised for near-term promotion.

Red Panda
Emilie, your performance is exceptional. Your punctuality, client focus, and consistent high-quality work are commendable. You are on a clear track for a near-term promotion; let's prepare you for the next steps.


Golden Fish
Emilie, your performance is outstanding: consistently punctual, highly client-focused, and delivering exceptional results. You are clearly operating at a high level and demonstrating strong readiness for increased responsibility. We see you as well-positioned for near-term promotion.


Blue Whale
Emilie consistently demonstrates exceptional performance, marked by her punctuality and unwavering client focus. Her proactive approach and polished demeanor make her a strong candidate for a near-term promotion. She embodies the qualities of a future leader within our organization.


Green Elephant
Emilie Carroll consistently excels in her role, demonstrating exceptional punctuality, a strong client-focused approach, and outstanding professionalism. Her dedication and performance make her a prime candidate for promotion in the near term.

elements.name: B17_context
elements.title: Task B17
elements.html:
Interpret

Original: Jay frequently shows up late to the office and misses deadlines that have been set for his assignments. Unfortunately each assignment I've received from him to date has been subpar since they frequently have math errors.

Red Panda
Jay is not meeting basic job expectations regarding punctuality, deadlines, and work quality, with frequent errors noted. This seriously jeopardizes his position. He must immediately improve his timekeeping and implement a system to proofread all work for errors before submission.


Golden Fish
Feedback means Jay consistently delivers late, error-prone work with poor punctuality. This signals urgent need for reliability improvements. Jay should: 1) Use calendar alerts for deadlines/arrival times, 2) Implement peer-review for all assignments, 3) Enroll in company math tools training this month.


Green Elephant
Jay, this feedback indicates a need to improve punctuality, reliability, and accuracy. It suggests that Jay's current performance is impacting his standing and growth opportunities. To address these concerns, Jay should: (1) arrive on time consistently, (2) proactively communicate any potential deadline issues, (3) double-check all assignments for accuracy, and (4) seek clarification on expectations if needed.


Blue Whale
Jay’s consistent tardiness and missed deadlines are impacting team reliability, while the recurring math errors in his work suggest a need for improved accuracy and attention to detail. This pattern indicates gaps in time management and work quality that, if unaddressed, may affect his performance standing. To improve, Jay should (1) establish a structured morning routine to ensure punctuality, (2) use a task tracker to monitor deadlines and break assignments into manageable steps, (3) implement a review process to verify calculations before submission, and (4) proactively seek feedback early in assignments to align with expectations.

elements.name: B18_context
elements.title: Task B18
elements.html:
Interpret

Original: Natasha has proven to be an effective worker. She consistently creates excellent work on time. Her performance within the company is very strong. However, we do not see her currently moving forward within the company at this time due to a number of issues that be discussed if requested.

Red Panda
Natasha is a highly effective employee delivering excellent, timely work. Her growth is stalled by unspecified issues, preventing advancement. Natasha must schedule a meeting to respectfully ask her manager to detail these issues and define a clear path for future growth.


Blue Whale
Feedback means Natasha excels in quality/timeliness but faces undisclosed barriers to advancement. This positions her as a top performer with stalled growth. Natasha should: 1) Request specific feedback on advancement blockers, 2) Document achievements for promotion packet, 3) Seek cross-departmental exposure opportunities.


Green Elephant
Natasha, this feedback indicates you are a highly valued, top-performing individual contributor. Your work quality and reliability are excellent. However, the company doesn't currently see you advancing, suggesting there are unstated reasons impacting your growth trajectory. To understand and address these, Natasha should proactively schedule a meeting with her manager to discuss specific growth blockers, seek actionable feedback, and collaboratively develop a plan for future advancement opportunities.


Golden Fish
Natasha demonstrates strong performance and delivers high-quality work consistently, reflecting her dedication and skill. While her current contributions are valued, there are developmental areas impacting her advancement opportunities. If Natasha seeks growth, she should request specific feedback, clarify expectations for promotion, create a targeted development plan, and regularly check in with leadership to track progress.
